lead_paragraph: EGOL--Marilyn, June 3, 1941 - January 13, 2014. Daughter to the late Beatrice and Norman Egol, twin sister of the late Morton Egol, sister-in-law to Nancy Egol, sister of David Egol. Marilyn was a loving daughter, sister and aunt to her nieces and nephews. Marilyn's passion was the ballet and her career in public relations in the ballet and other performing arts spanned decades. She was known to family, friends and colleagues for her charming wit and her cultured intellect. Marilyn will be greatly missed.
